attributes.action: Appoint Miss Joanna Lumley, OBE, a Dame Commander of the British Empire (DBE)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I hereby propose that Miss Joanna Lumley OBE be appointed a Dame Commander of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire - DBE.
In recognition of her Services to the Nation and to the Gurkha Regiment and its welfare.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
